###### Draw Star

```{r Stars, fig.height=2, dev='svg'}

library(ggplot2)

x1 <- c( 0, 2, -2)
y1 <- c(-2, 1,  1)

ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = data.frame(x = x1, y = y1), aes(x = x, y = y), fill="red")
  
```
